citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the last regularly scheduled visit to the premises occurred in February 2024, and the written
program of veterinary care identifies the regular schedule as annually. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending
veterinarian under formal arrangements which shall include regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor.
Correct by 23 January 2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
At the time of inspection, the last regularly scheduled visit to the premises occurred in February 2024, and the written 
program of veterinary care identifies the regular schedule as annually. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending 
veterinarian under formal arrangements which shall include regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor. 
 
Correct by 23 January 2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
